A customer shall be able to place an order through their engaged menu if it is  pending and not empty.: Functional
User shall be able to navigate through the CCTNS application.: Functional
A customer shall be able to add an item to a pending order by dragging the  item from the engaged menu onto the order.: Functional
Admin must not dismiss an engaged menu unless the customer requests it.: Non-functional
Admin must not dismiss an engaged menu unless the customer requests it.: Non-functional
A customer shall be able to engage their menu by double tapping the activated  surface computer in their table.: Functional
Customer shall be able to view menu and categories and subcategories involved.: Functional
Customers shall navigate menus and add items to their cart.: Functional
Customer shall be able to order items from wallet amount.: Functional
A customer shall be able to add a special dietary requirement to an order by  dragging the requirement from the engaged menu onto the order.: Functional
Customer shall be able to engage bill mode to finalize payment through their chosen menu by cash.: Functional
A surface computer must not dismiss an engaged menu unless the customer  requests it.: Non-functional
The system shall provide a structured experience for users to navigate through commands tailored to their needs.: Functional
Restaurants shall be able to CRUD items from the menu.: Functional
